string.value: #p2020006# from #m211000000# was attacked by a huge yeti in the snowfield a while ago. Let's go and hear about this attack from #p2020006#.

#p2020006# says that he was attacked by a huge yeti while skiing in the snowy mountains of El Nath. What could have attacked #p2020006#? #b#p2020007##k knows a lot about snowfield creatures. Let's go and ask about them.
Asked #p2020007# about the creature that attacked #p2020006#. #p2020007# seems to know something about the creature.
아직도 가슴이 두근두근 거려.\r\n#b#L0#깜짝 놀랄 일을 겪었다면서요?#l
응! 얼마 전에 설원의 풍경을 그리고 싶어져서 엘나스 산맥 근처까지 나간 적이 있는데, 거기서 거대한 생물의 습격을 받았어.\r\n#b#L0#어떤 생물이었어요?#l
사람들은 내 말을 믿지 않겠지만 털모자를 쓰고 스키를 타고 돌아다니는 거대한 예티였어! \r\n#b#L0#예...예티요?#l
그래! 믿기지는 않겠지만 정말 사실이라구! 하지만 아무도 내 말을 믿으려고 하지 않아. 아 그래! 그 사람이라면 그 생물에 대해 알고 있을 지도 몰라. 그 사람을 찾아가봐.
I can still feel my heart thumping.\r\n#b#L0#I heard you've been through a lot these days.#l

Yes, indeed! I had this sudden urge to see the beautiful snowfield scenery, so I went to #bEl Nath Mountain Range#b. However, I was attacked by a huge creature there.\r\n#b#L0#What kind of creature?#l
Nothing would believe it in me, but I saw a huge Yeti on skis wearing a woolen hat! \r\n#b#L0#Y... yeti?#l
Yes! You may think me strange, but I really saw one with my very two eyes! Nobody seems to believe me. Ah, right! He might know something about the creature. Please go and meet him.
Hunter #b#p2020007##k has been hunting this snowfield for a long time, and is bound to know something about the creature. Please go meet #b#p2020007##k.
You don't believe me, don't you? You're no different from the rest of them! I just know he will believe in me... he's the only one who can prove I'm not a liar.
Umm... why have you come?\r\n#b#L0#I have something to ask you.#l
Don't know what you'd have to say to me, but hurry up.\r\n#b#L0#(Told Scadur of #p2020006#'s story.)#l
Hmm... he was wearing ski boots, right?
Hunter #b#p2020007##k will know what that creature was.
